channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP NetWeaver AS ABAP and ABAP Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP NetWeaver AS ABAP and ABAP Platform

item.title: CVE-2021-27610|2024-08-03T21:26:09.712Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20netweaver%20as%20abap%20and%20abap%20platform
item.description: SAP NetWeaver ABAP Server and ABAP Platform, versions - 700, 701, 702, 731, 740, 750, 751, 752, 753, 754, 755, 804, does not create information about internal and external RFC user in consistent and distinguished format, which could lead to improper authentication and may be exploited by malicious users to obtain illegitimate access to the system.
